title: johan_ozalentour
author: johan_ozalentour
created_time: August 25, 2022, 10:50:09 AMLast edit: September 06, 2022, 12:29:47 PM by johan_ozalentour
content: https://i.imgur.com/lLHz88k.pngHello from Ozalentour! Our whole team is gathered in our offices in Lille (France) and we thought it would be a good time to introduce ourselves to the Bitcointalk community.Currently, we are building a complementary proximity economy via a payment application 3.0, all composed of a central core on a hybrid between 2 large blockchains!1- Our first token is known as OZAPHYRE (‚Ç¨OZP). (by Stellar)It is a stable "fidelity token" used to facilitate cash-ins, payments and investments via Ozalentour (guaranteed on a EURO reserve)This token will be exclusively available through our Ozalentour application.2- To complete our offer, we have also developed an "placement token" to facilitate investments in crypto-currencies: OZACOIN ($OZA). (by BSC)https://i.imgur.com/VAFISST.pngThis token will be available via Pinksale for pre-sale, then via Pancakeswap and various listings for this end of 2022. (see the whitepaper)Also note that our Ozalentour app will allow you to start your own crypto-currency business within a community of verified professionals and individuals (KYC/KYB/AML ON).Payments will be made mainly via QRCODE and cash transfers via Stellar (2x faster than VISA, no cap and contactless).Note that we are a company composed of 41 shareholders with a capital of 210.680‚Ç¨. In the fund raising phase, we are also followed by several partners to obtain our PSAN VISA (95% finalized).Do not hesitate to join our Telegram if you have any questions. Sincerely,The FounderJD PS An ICO for the $OZA token is approaching! Don't miss the opportunity!!!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Take a look at our website and make sure to stay up to date by joining our Telegram.Website: https://en.ozalentour.com/Ozacoin (The Placement Token) : https://en.ozalentour.com/placement-token/Read the Whitepaper (.pdf): https://en.ozalentour.com/pdf/white_paper_ozalentour_en.pdfJoin the Telegram: https://t.me/Ozalentour_officialSee our Team: https://en.ozalentour.com/team

comments.author: Ghauspie
comments.body: Hello everyone.All the Ozalentour team is eager to show you the future progress of this beautiful project.

comments.author: Nicolas Munoz
comments.body: Hi everyone !Join us on our telegram to get the latest news about the project .Feel free to ask anything you want to know and build the future with us !

comments.author: Lou_Duquenoy
comments.body: Hello everyone,In order to see the progress of this project do not hesitate to visit our website, join our social networks and read our whitepaper to have a better view about its ecosystem.

comments.author: Donovan670
comments.created_time: August 30, 2022, 09:48:33 AMLast edit: August 31, 2022, 02:56:59 PM by Donovan670
comments.body: Hi there¬† I introduce myself as Donovan, Business Developer within the company Ozalentour.We look forward to present to you the final phase of the payment application.The future is now with OZA ü•ÅüöÄ

comments.author: Blandine Dreano
comments.body: Hi everyone,I am Blandine and am in public relations officer for Ozalentour.I hope everyone is ready for the app launchStay connected and enjoy

comments.author: koang
comments.body: It will be more attractive if you add some visuals to this ANN, and a better presentation.Everything will go well if you can attract users to check your project, especially here. There are many serious investors here.And what about marketing, Do you have a bounty program to promote your project here?

comments.author: Blandine Dreano
comments.body: Hello @koangThank you for your advice. It is always a pleasure to see the interest you take in our project.As far as the marketing plan is concerned, we are preparing an ICO that we plan to launch soon. I invite you to visit our website https://fr.ozalentour.com/ and download our application.
